At School_E, students tend to thrive when they’re curious, consistent in their effort, and willing to take initiative (we put a lot of weight on sustained engagement and follow-through, not just one-off performance). We also value students who contribute to the community—peer support, collaboration, and a respectful school culture matter a lot here.

In selection, we look for (1) academic readiness and growth trajectory, (2) reliability/attendance and responsibility, and (3) evidence you’ll take advantage of what we offer (clubs, projects, leadership, etc.).

To help you evaluate fit: what are you looking for in a school this year (academics, clubs, support, environment), and what would make School_E move up on your list?
